title: Habitar - serif - font ID
content:
Looking for an ID on the serif font used for Habitar

Many thanks in advance,  
Danny

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150124012345im_/http:/typophile.com/files/tumblr_nhtn97nZVt1qbjmauo1_1280_3849.jpg)

| --- | --- |
| [tumblr\_nhtn97nZVt1qbjmauo1\_1280.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150124012345/http:/typophile.com/files/tumblr_nhtn97nZVt1qbjmauo1_1280.jpg) | 90.58 KB |
author: Danny_Miller

comments.content: **[Romana (Bold)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150124012345/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Bitstream%20%2F%20%28Commercial%29&ffam=Romana%20BT%20-%20Bold&fid=f4b4bac7558be37fcf6a05cde4f247da&fsize=60&text=Habitar&fit=1)** by Theophile Beaudoire, Gustav F. Schroeder [1860,1892]
